snippet: Knicks point guard Jason Kidd intends to fight a charge that he was drunk when he crashed his sport utility vehicle into a telephone pole in the Hamptons over the summer.
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Jason Kidd intends to fight a charge that he was drunk when he crashed his sport utility vehicle into a telephone pole in the Hamptons over the summer.
lead_paragraph: Knicks point guard Jason Kidd intends to fight a charge that he was drunk when he crashed his sport utility vehicle into a telephone pole in the Hamptons over the summer.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Kidd to Fight Drunken Driving Charge
headline.main: Knicks’ Jason Kidd to Fight Drunken Driving Charge
headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Kidd to Fight Charge in Accident
